text_logic_form: The length of the line $AD$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $4$ units.
Find the length of the line $DE$.

diagram_logic_form: Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $B$.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $A$.
The line $CA$ is perpendicular to the line $EC$.
The line $EC$ is perpendicular to the line $ED$.
The line $CD$ is perpendicular to the line $DA$.
